SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Defines the course of all the game, change the model and send responses to the clients

  • Constructor Summary

    GameController(ConnectionControl connectionControl)
    A simple constructor also used to set the reference for the ConnectionControl.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(ConnectionControl connectionControl)
      A simple constructor also used to set the reference for the ConnectionControl.
      Parameters:
      connectionControl - of the game.

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      public void createGame(ArrayList<String> playersList, String gameFilePath)
      Creates the game with all the necessary (board, bookshelves, ...) and starts it
      Parameters:
      playersList - the list of this game's players.
      gameFilePath - the file's path to save game into.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame(ArrayList<String> onlinePlayers, List<String> playersList, com.google.gson.JsonObject json, String gameFilePath)
      Called to resume game from a file.
      Parameters:
      onlinePlayers - players already online to play their game.
      playersList - all the players of the game.
      json - the jsonObject with game's details.
      gameFilePath - the path of the file with game's details.

    • run

      public void run(int startFrom)
      Calls each player's turn until somebody completes his/her Bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      startFrom - the position, in playersList array list, that indicates the first player that has to play.

    • runLastTurn

      public void runLastTurn(String nickname)
      If the current player is not the first one, makes all the remaining one play their turn Calls the method to calculate the final score and end the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player that has just finished his turn.

    • insertCard

      public void insertCard(String nickname, ArrayList<ItemCard> cards, int column)
      The method tries to insert the cards selected
      Parameters:
      nickname - who wants to insert on the bookshelf
      cards - to be inserted
      column - positions on the bookshelf

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard(String nickname, ArrayList<Integer> positions)
      The method tries to select cards from board
      Parameters:
      nickname - who wants to select
      positions - of the cards to be deleted

    • isGameIsActive

      public boolean isGameIsActive()
      Called to see if the game is active
      Returns:
      If the game is active

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Called by the GameModel when it wants to notify its update/changes. This method is used to implement a listener pattern.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - is a PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source, and the property that has changed.

    • sendGameDetails

      public void sendGameDetails(String nickname)
      Called when a player has come back to the game, calls the method on the GameModel to send him all the game's details.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the client to send details to.
